text: Amar Osim (born 18 July 1967) is a Bosnia and Herzegovina former football player. He is one of the most successful Bosnian-Herzegovinian football managers. ==Managerial statistics== Managerial record by team and tenure Team From To Record Željezničar 1 March 2001 10 October 2003 JEF United Chiba 20 July 2006 31 December 2007 Željezničar 22 June 2009 19 September 2013 Al Kharaitiyat 27 December 2014 5 November 2016 Željezničar 31 December 2018 11 April 2021 Velež Mostar 11 June 2022 29 November 2022 Total ==Honours== ===Manager=== Željezničar *Bosnian Premier League: 2000–01, 2001–02, 2009–10, 2011–12, 2012–13 *Bosnian Cup: 2000–01, 2002–03, 2010–11, 2011–12 *Bosnian Supercup: 2001 JEF United Chiba *J.League Cup: 2006 Individual *Bosnia and Herzegovina Manager of the Year: 2002, 2012 *Bosnian Premier League Manager of the Year/Season: 2010, 2011–12, 2012–13 *Qatar Stars League Manager of the Month: February 2015 ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina footballers Category:Bosnia and Herzegovina football managers Category:People from Sarajevo
title: Amar Osim
